thread.title: Excellent hotel - Review
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel - Review of Hotel 7 Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: melissaaca0392
title: Excellent hotel - Review
text: We are just back from a weekend in Paris! Hotel was brilliant!!!! Staff were lovely and once we arrived we got an instant upgrade which was great!!.. rooms were clean and tidy with everything you need!.. small enough rooms but that's what you expect from Paris!! Very central location 10 mins walk from Eiffel Tower and situated on nice street with super markets and patisseries near by.. would highly recommend!!!!
